title: Search and State: Tropic Thunder S2-R Skull Jersey
content: Search and State’s limited edition jerseys are usually an all-over pattern ranging from camo, to palm fronds, and flowers but this one is a bit different. The Tropic Thunder S2-R Skull Jersey looks like nothing the brand has done before, featuring a big, bright design, centered on the back, with a small, subdued branding hit on the chest. These are really wild, so they might not be for everyone, but if you’re interested in them, head to Search and State.
author: prolly
